descript.purpose: This dataset was developed with the intention of protecting the public drinking water supply and complies with the federal Safe Drinking Water Act, United States Code, title 42 and the State of Minnesota Rule (parts 4720.5100 to 4720.5590).
descript.abstract: These sets of data include the drinking water supply management area boundaries and the vulnerability levels within each management area in Minnesota. More information can be found at: http://www.health.state.mn.us/divs/eh/water/swp/maps/index.htm Follow the links below to the access the individual metadata pages for each layer: Drinking Water Supply Management Areas: drinking_water_supply_management_areas.html Drinking Water Supply Management Areas Vulnerability: drinking_water_supply_management_area_vulnerability.html

timeperd.current: publication date; data capture represents the period 07/11/1995 - 09/01/2014

theme.themekey: Drinking Water Supply Management Area, Groundwatershed, Vulnerability, Drinking water, Capture zone, Wellhead Protection
